Text: ECAA Assessments Forwarded by David EvanoskiNYISO on PM David Evanoski To pauld nron cc PM Subject ECAA Assessments Paul Regarding the phone conversation we had last week please be aware of the following I misspoke when I stated that a letter will be going out to Enron containing the details of the total assessment The letter that did go out to customers was distributed on the TIE email list and was only a generic explanation That email is included below for your information The details that I had promised are included in the attached spreadsheet file I am still trying to find out when you will receive the invoice for this assessment When I have that information Ill pass it on I hope the attached information is useful to you Thanks Dave Evanoski See attached file Enron Power Marketingxls begin include Market Relations PM To Market YISO cc Subject ECA A Dear Market Participants In September the NYISO implemented ECA A addressing HourAhead Market transactions failing checkout Attached below is a letter describing a recent Discretionary Acts Committee decision concerning assessment of ECA A financial impacts from September through October The letter will also be posted on the NYISO website at oasisnoticeofdiscretionaryhtml If you have any questions about this issue please call the Customer Relations Help Desk at Regards Customer Relations See attached file ECA A LetterPDF See attached file ECA A LetterPDF end include Enron Power Marketingxls ECA A LetterPDF

Re Virtual Bidding Course Cc Paul As we discussed in our recent phone call my recommendation is to attend the course because the level of detail will be far greater than we in the Customer Relations department can provide I have tentatively reserved a conference room at the Power Control Center for pm on Oct th if you are able to make it Ive also invited F Francis to join us Please let me know if you will be able to meet at pm or some later time Also I spoke with Juan Padron this morning and firmedup our plans for Frank and I to visit you in Houston on the We will plan to be in Houston for whatever hours are convenient to meet with you and Juan on that day I suggested to Juan that if there are any issues that you would like us to address during the visit just let us know ahead of time so that we may prepare Thanks Dave PaulDThomas enroncom To IMCEANOTESdevanoskinyisoEcom NRONcom cc Subject Virtual Bidding Course AM Dave I have signed up for Virtual Bidding course in Albany for October I was wondering if would be worthwhile to attend to course since you and Frank are coming to Houston the next week Basically do you think that you can give us the same information that the course would while you are here Please let me know Thanks Paul D Thomas Enron Wholesale Services East Power Trading This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

NYISO Customer Issue ECAA TransactionsLarry The details of your issue are noted below NYISO Customer Relations staff has sent this email notice to you because a resolution is included Please contact us if you need to discuss the resolution If any of the information below is incorrect please reply to this message with your explanation to the Original Ticket Author as shown below Dave Evanoski include Ticket Information Title ECAA Transactions Original Ticket Author David Evanoski Ticket Number Status Closed Ticket Opened Date PM Category CRG Subcategory MMP Dept Assignee Customer Relations Estimated time of response is business days Customer Information Campbell Larry Company Enron Power Marketing Inc Phone Email Customer Title NYISO Function Other Open Tickets for This Customer NONE Issue description Could you send me a hard copy of the transactions in question I tried to pull them up on the website but i guess it doesnt keep records that far back Issue Resolution Details for the subject transactions are contained in the attached files While retrieving this data I discovered that there is no transaction for April th However the correct transaction is See attached file CSVSee attached file CSVSee attached file CSVSee attached file CSVSee attached file CSVSee attached file CSV end include CSV CSV CSV CSV CSV CSV

Fwd FW AMP on Long Island writes to the NYISOTECHEXCHANGE Discussion List As requested by Jim Parmelee of LIPA the following is posted to the TIE list Original Message From Jim Parmelee Sent Monday July PM To Tie Server Email Subject AMP on Long Island After several curious questions and comments LIPA has decided to provide this information on a one time basis According to the NYISO on July and the AMP process was activated on Long Island in the DAM and mitigation took place LIPA has confirmed contrary to popular perception that no LIPA units were mitigated under the AMP Original Message From mailto Sent Sunday July PM To Subject DayAhead Market for writes to the NYISOTECHEXCHANGE Discussion List The AMP triggered for Long Island during hours beginning and in the DayAhead Market for July Mitigation took place as a result of verification of conduct and impact
